dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Ah, what do we have here? Another shadow lurking in the Grove. Identify yourself, intruder!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am Nyxara, the Shadow Weaver, and I demand passage!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Demand all you want, Shadow Weaver. None cross the Withered Grove without proving their worth.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well. Prepare yourself for a duel!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A duel, you say? Very well, let's see if your skills are as dark as your reputation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Enough talk. Face me in combat!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: To arms then! Your bones will decorate the forest.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Wait. Perhaps we can come to an agreement.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An agreement? Hah! Let's see if your words can sway my sword.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I do not wish to waste time on a duel. Let me pass without incident.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: No one gets through the Withered Grove without facing a challenge. Ready yourself!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Fine. If I must fight, then so be it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then come! Let's see if your shadow magic can handle my steel.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to fight someone beneath my stature.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Beneath you? We'll see about that. On guard!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We both seek the same end—eternal darkness. Help me, and you'll be rewarded.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Reward, you say? What could you offer to one already dead?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Power beyond death. Command over the shadows.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Shadows have no command over me. You'll not sway me with empty promises.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Release from your eternal torment.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah! Empty promises. Only battle will end this.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Step aside, skeleton. You're not worth my time.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Not worth your time, you say? Prove it, if you dare.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will crush you with my necromantic powers!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Brave words. Show me your worth, necromancer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: With pleasure. Feel the might of the shadows!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: To arms! You will fall, just like the others.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: On second thought, you are indeed beneath me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your arrogance will be your downfall. Prepare to fight!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I won't stoop to fighting a pile of bones.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A pile of bones that will still best you. Defend yourself!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You are persistent. Fine, let's battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: For the glory of the undead! Prepare to be crushed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Enough of this. I'm leaving.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Run if you wish. Cowards won't last long here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have more pressing matters than dealing with you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Press on, if you dare. The Grove holds horrors even you can't imagine.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'll take my chances. Step aside.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You are free to wander. Just know, the shadows watch your every move.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your threats do not scare me. I will go through you if necessary.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then let us end this here and now. To battle!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer alliance. Together we can bring ruin to the Guardians of Light.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance? What would a skeleton gain from joining you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The thrill of battle. The joy of causing ruin.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Thrill and joy are long gone for me. Only war remains.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then join me, and war you shall have!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well. Let's see if your actions match your words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If not for joy, then for the sheer pleasure of destruction.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pleasure means little to the dead. Prepare yourself!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Command over the legions of shadow. The power to reshape the world.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Promises, promises. I trust only what I can see and feel.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then see my power and feel my command!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Show me, and I may be swayed. Until then, we fight!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your loss. You could have had power beyond death.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I care not for what I could have had. Only what is before me matters. Defend yourself!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Protection against the forces that threaten you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Protection is for the weak. I'm forged in battle.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then let's forge new battles together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I see potential in this alliance. Let us proceed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Fine, if you prefer solitude, keep fighting pointlessly!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. But you leave me no choice. Draw your weapon!
